entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
